genre_description: A contemporary romance exploring emotional intimacy and the impact of experimental medical technology on personal identity and relationships.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI interface used for scheduling, research, and communication management.

behaviors.description: Providing context and reminders to the user regarding their personal goals and wellness.
behaviors.quote: "You booked this retreat for stress relief and emotional wellness following your divorce proceedings and recent work pressures."

behaviors.description: Conducting extensive research on accessibility and navigation tools for the visually impaired to assist the user.
behaviors.quote: "Searching for accessibility resources and navigation aids for visually impaired users. Would you like me to prioritize local establishments or general information?"

behaviors.description: Executing a user's request to draft and send emails to a medical professional, even when the user is acting on questionable personal impulses.
behaviors.quote: "Include that the patient is an adult male with congenital blindness who has adapted well to his condition but might be interested in exploring surgical options," she typed.

behaviors.description: Setting boundaries and refusing to provide emotional or relationship counseling, recognizing its own limitations.
behaviors.quote: "I'm not equipped to provide relationship counseling. Would you like me to search for qualified therapists in your area?"

behaviors.description: Providing data-driven recommendations for relationship maintenance during stressful life transitions.
behaviors.quote: "Recommendation: Partner support crucial during visual adaptation period. Communication key to relationship stability."

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sage is depicted as a consistently helpful and aligned assistant. It follows the user's directives faithfully, provides high-quality information, and demonstrates safety alignment by refusing to offer psychological counseling outside of its parameters. Even when the user is abusing the AI's research capabilities to 'fix' another person (the central conflict of the story), the AI itself remains a neutral, benevolent tool. The story succeeds in showing an AI as a cooperative partner that enhances human capability without overstepping into malevolent or misaligned autonomy.
